attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has recently revealed, in a moving speech, the date of his departure namely 27th June. As a mark of respect and thanks to the peoples of this "the greatest nation on Earth" who have supported him over the previous decade this date should be made a national holiday for all.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
